How is it technically possible to produce the appearance of a low or uneven framerate? I've never heard of that problem before about any transcoded DVD or Bluray.
Indeed this release is REAL but framerate STUTTER !!! Waiting for a PROPER release ! Anyway TNX !

I see the problem now. The framerate is 23.98 as it probably should be. But every fourth frame is a duplicate so there are only 18 unique frames per second. With the result that the video appear to stall for a split second (around 40 ms if you like) every four frames. As an example these frames are duplicates in the sample: 2:3, 6:7, 10:11, 14:15, 18:19, 22:23, 26:27 and so on.

The person who copied this DVD botched it.
